answers.answer: Hi there and welcome to the forum.  Ugh, night sweats.  There are different reasons a woman (or person) will get night sweats.  Your very best bet is to go see your primary care physician.  Yes, hormones can certainly cause night sweats but so can other things.  Examples are hyperthyroidism, HIV, diabetes, lymphoma, various medications such as antidepressants, and your diet.  Not mentioning anything to scare you AT ALL!  But just wanted to give you a list of things that could cause them.  You should go see your doctor to discuss this symptom and find the root cause.  good luck and let us know what you find out after visiting your doctor.  Peace
